meta.name: Danilo
meta.title: Illustrator
meta.bio: Living in a small village off the coast of Cuneo, Italy, Danilo brings his vibrant, expressive, and colorful style.  His experience includes Disney, Kinder Ferrero, Shutterstock, and Fotolia.
meta.more: Danilo's style ranges from cute and cuddly to dark, mysterious, and horrifing.  A perfect blend for building a world of magic and adventure.

meta.name: Ryan
meta.title: Principal Engineer
meta.bio: Ryan has worked in education, films, and retail industries as a software engineer.  Now, they're making games, balancing spells, and loves quad skating.
meta.more: Ryan works with the team to create the best possible experience for our players.  They're also a member of the LGBTQ+ community and an advocate for diversity and inclusion.

meta.name: Adora
meta.title: Office Kat
meta.bio: Agile, curious, and playful, Adora keeps balance in our environment.  She's a predator to the laser pointer and enjoys napping in the Florida sun.
meta.more: Aside from her duties, Adora doesn't mind splashing in a shallow pool of water.
